page.title: 02SURVEY OF HOUSES. 2.
page.content: {Link Detached.}My house is link detched which means it is joined to the next house by the garage.It is made of brick and has twelve windows and two doors.There are two chimneys.The house is painted black and white.The garage and the decorative parts at the top of the windows are black.Although the house is made of bricks it is painted white. {Semi Detached. }My semi detached house is mostly built of bricks but on the front it has some varnished boards, underneath the window of the lounge and underneath my mom and dad's bedroom window.The window frames are white but the front door is just plain wood varnished.We have a small front porch with a dustbin store and a bigger porch at the back with a toilet in it.We have a small back and front garden.
